text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
A-all right, then! I suppose I'll see you<n>on the
track!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Indeed. I trust you won't hold back.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Right! Um... I'll be going, then!
choice_data_list: Is she racing with you today?
Is she racing with you today?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Indeed. She intends to attempt the<n>Classics this
year.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Her performance of late has been a sight<n>to
behold. And she even came to<n>personally wish me
well.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
When I was young, I used to greet the<n>older
students in the same way.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Back then, practicing with my elders<n>helped me
achieve greater successes.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Now that I am the elder, I hope to<n>inspire by
example.
choice_data_list: Are you sure you're not getting overconfident?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
What, are you worried she'll catch me by<n>
surprise?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Let me ask you, Trainerâ€”do you believe<n>I would
underestimate an opponent just<n>because they
were younger?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Then that is all we shall say about that.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Besides, it is the place of the strong to<n>teach
budding racers the taste of defeat.<n>I am only
doing my duty.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Now, I believe it's time for the Emperor<n>to get to
work.
